means: 责骂，斥责( scold的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: You should ease up on the child and stop scolding her.
sentence.Network_cn: 你应该对那个孩子宽松些,不要再骂她了.

sentence.Network_en: Don't glare at me like that, you deserved the scolding.
sentence.Network_cn: 不要那么瞪着我, 你本该受到训斥的.

sentence.Network_en: The woman is always scolding the children in our neighbourhood.
sentence.Network_cn: 那个妇人常责骂我们附近的孩子.

PerfectNetExp.abs: she would sing over the tub , out singing Martha's a scolding .她一面洗衣一面唱歌，她的歌声大过玛莎的责骂声。
He said without scolding ., 他用毫不责备的口气说.
the old woman is always scolding ., 这位老太太总是怨天尤人.
constantly , continually , continuously Her tongue was incessantly scolding .她嘴里不断地训人。

list.abs: I gave him a scolding ., 我又干了他一顿.
叱_百度百科 ... ◎ 叱喝[ shout at] ◎ 叱骂[ curse;scold roundly] ◎ 叱问[ call sb. to account].
did you scold her for breaking it ., 她把那件东西打破了 , 你骂她了吗.
when your father scolds you , you shouldn't answer ( him ) back .当你父亲责备你时，你不应该回嘴。

entry.def: If you scold someone, you speak angrily to them because they have done something wrong.

example.ex: If he finds out, he'll scold me...
example.tran: 如果他知道了，肯定会责骂我的。

example.ex: Later she scolded her daughter for having talked to her father like that...
example.tran: 后来她训斥女儿不应该那样对父亲说话。

auth_sentence.content: Frau Nowak's shrill scolding rose to a scream.
auth_sentence.res_content: Frau Nowak's shrill scolding rose to a scream.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Frau Nowak's shrill scolding rose to a scream.

auth_sentence.content: He sounded stern, as though scolding his son.
auth_sentence.res_content: He sounded stern, as though scolding his son.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He sounded stern, as though scolding his son.

auth_sentence.content: It is a bit like scolding a person for not having health insurance.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is a bit like scolding a person for not having health insurance.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is a bit like scolding a person for not having health insurance.

sentences.en: I gave him a good scolding.
sentences.cn: 我狠狠地责骂了他一顿。

sentences.en: Don’t glare at me like that,you deserved the scolding.
sentences.cn: 不要那么瞪着我,你本该受到训斥。

sentences.en: His mother dealt him a severe scolding.
sentences.cn: 他母亲狠狠地骂了他一顿。

sentences.en: The woman is always scolding the children in our neighbourhood.
sentences.cn: 那个妇人常责骂我们附近的孩子。
